title: The Heart of an Assassin
description: A warring crime family hires an assassin to take out the competition.Follow the an assassin bent on completing his mission. An assassin who claims no loyalty to anyone.Follow the life of a young man who grows up to be a detective and through a twist of fate ends up protecting the assassins next mark.The story is filled with intrigue and mystery, keeping the reader on the edge of his/her seat. With a surprising ending that no one saw coming.Assassin, Mystery, Suspense, Mob Wars, Intrigue, Drama, Crime Syndicate,
author: Antonio Bertot
